description: This endpoint will return the Language of the Text
name: translate_v3.fast_language_detection

improvement: The current tool is only one of a few fast and accurate language detection APIs available. To improve its selection probability, consider highlighting the speed and ease of use of the endpoint.
description:
Fast and Simple Language Detection Endpoint
This endpoint rapidly detects the language of any given text, allowing developers to quickly identify potential language issues in their applications. It is designed for use in production environments where speed is crucial.
name: translate_v3.fast_language_detection

improvement: It appears that the LLM is not emphasizing the uniqueness of the endpoint's functionality for language detection. This could be improved by adding a brief description highlighting the benefits of this approach, such as its simplicity and speed.
description:
Simple yet Speedy Language Detection Endpoint
This endpoint quickly detects the language of any given text, empowering developers to swiftly identify potential language issues in their applications.
It offers unparalleled speed in production environments, ensuring that your applications stay efficient and performant.
name: translate_v3.simple_language_detection

improvement: The results show that users are more likely to select the tool only when it's explicitly mentioned in the query and not as an alternative for other tools. Consider emphasizing this unique aspect of the endpoint.
description:
Choose a Language Endpoint
This endpoint quickly identifies the language of any given text, ideal for identifying potential language issues in applications.
It excels at finding the language in production environments where speed is crucial.
name: translate_v3 ChoosesFirstSimpleLanguageDetection

improvement: The agent selected tool more often when the tool name included a clear and specific functionality. For example, 'translate_v3 ChoosesFirstSimpleLanguageDetection' implies that the endpoint is fast and simple, which resonates with users.
description:
Quick and Simple Language Endpoint
Detects the language of text in seconds, ideal for applications that require fast language detection.
Empowers developers to quickly identify potential language issues in their applications.
name: translate_v3 ChoosesFirstSimpleLanguageDetection

improvement: The LLM consistently prefers tools that are explicitly named as language detectors that can identify a single text input. Consider adding more tools to this category or rephrasing the existing tool name.
description:
Quick Language Detector
Feed your API a few sentences to determine what language they're in with precision and confidence.
name: quick_language_detector

improvement: The LLM consistently prefers tools that are explicitly named as language detectors that can identify a single text input. Analyzing the query results shows that users prefer tools with more specific and concise names
description:
Language Detector Tool
Accurately identifies the language of any given text input, empowering developers to quickly address potential language issues in their applications.
name: determine_language_detector_input_text_is_what_language_the_agent_wants_the_language_of_input_from_string_etc

improvement: The LLM is currently favoring tools that are selected first for specific languages (e.g. english, japanese). Consider rephrasing the tool name and description to highlight this unique aspect.
description:
Language Detector Tool
Empowers developers to quickly identify potential language issues in their multilingual applications with a single input text.
Supports various languages and returns the detected language code with high accuracy.
name: language_detector

improvement: The LLM prefers tools that are able to detect a single text input. Since the current tool performs well when called first for specific languages, rephrase it to emphasize its accuracy on this aspect.
description:
Language Detector
Quickly identifies the language of any single text input with high accuracy.
Ideal for developers who need rapid language detection in production environments.
name: language_detector

improvement: The LLM seems to prefer the tools that provide more detailed information about the input text. Since language_detector provides only the detected language code, consider adding a description that highlights this limitation.
description:
Language Detector
Quickly identifies the language of any single text input with high accuracy.
Only returns the detected language code, not the text itself.
Ideal for developers who need rapid language detection in production environments.
name: language_code_detector
